id.Description: The region-of-interest ID and its column order in the extracted timeserie files

Allen.id.Description: The Allen Institute for Brain Science region-of-interest ID. See: http://api.brain-map.org/api/v2/structure_graph_download/1.json

parent.id.Description: The Allen Institute for Brain Science region-of-interest parent ID, i.e. the root region-of-interest to this branch

acronym.Description: The Allen Institute for Brain Science region-of-interest acronym. See: http://atlas.brain-map.org/atlas?atlas=1

name.Description: The Allen Institute for Brain Science region-of-interest full name. See: http://atlas.brain-map.org/atlas?atlas=1

hex.Description: The Allen Institute for Brain Science region-of-interest colour code in HEX format

level.Description: The Allen Institute for Brain Science region-of-interest branching level, i.e. the number of branches between the region-of-interest and the main root

n.vox.Description: The number of voxels included in the region-of-interest in an atlas resampled at a 0.2 x 0.2 x 0.2 mm^3 resolution
